author: ramona1981

comments.content:
Tahitian: 2 different /i and 2 different /a so should be hand-drawn; alternatives: [Bolide Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132339/http:/www.fonts.com/font/panache-typography/bolide/script), [DeBorstel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132339/http:/www.identifont.com/link?BHOKX9+27Y0), [Pastiche Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132339/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush), [Pablo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132339/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/pablo)  
noni: [FIFA Welcome](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132339/http:/www.dafont.com/fifa-welcome.font)
